Title: Sumbmit to Reddit
Submit to reddit in a new tab
Description: Submit current URL to Reddit in a new tab

Title: Org-mode hyperlink
Code:
var md = "[[" + document.URL + "][" + document.title + "]]" ;
prompt("Enter Ctrl+C to copy this org-mode hyperlink. :", md);

Title: Clear google URL
Description: Clear google search URLs to allow easy copy URLs without messing it.

Title: inject css
Description: Inject css style sheet from a given URL into current page.

Title: Copy Gdriver URL
Description:
Open a prompt showing Google driver URL to current document. Useful to
create short URL in services like tiny URL and view document in
Tablets or Smartphones.

Title: open Gdriver prompt
Description: Past some URL and open it in Google driver.

Title: open in WebArchive
Code:
var baseUrl = "https://web.archive.org/web/*/"
var urlmod  = document.URL
window.location.href = baseUrl + urlmod
Description: Open page that doesn't exist anymore in Web Archive
